Text: I didn't realize that the wording of the title may be misleading, so just to be clear, this torrent DOES NOT include a mono version of the "McCartney" album. It only includes special edition stereo remaster editions of "RAM" and "McCartney" and the 2012 mono remaster of "RAM". Also, if anybody does have a mono version of "McCartney" I would love to know about it. Just post it in a comment on this page.
